dialogPart.text: AAI never expected to meet a knight of Lodis! I will never forgive you for all that I lost 15 years ago. You burned down my town and killed my parents!!! Thankfully, I’ve acquired the skills of a soldier.
“I understand that it’s hard for you, but that was a long time ago...”
